TopicTitle: Watch me Fail in KSP [Lets Play][Career Mode][Funny][1PerDay]

Articles.Content:
Hello fellow Kerbal Space Program players, I have been running a youtube channel for around 3 months now and Its been an amazing journey! I have known about KSP for quite some time now and have fiddled around with it every once and a while, but then 0.22 came out! A kind of objective to the game. Something that I can try and set an objective.

I recently thought that I could do a lets play on just that, But I was missing out on one aspect of the game. How to actually play it, so I'm in need of some help, whilst this may be my lets play you guys can really help me out by commenting any techniques you have found or even some goals that you would like me to do in the mere future. I have already got an outstanding response from my first episode on different social media for example Twitter and Reddit.

I'm making this thread so you can help me out and by subscribing to this tread you will always see when new videos come out or if you need any help maybe you might read some things other people might have to say. Anyway I will be posting my videos bellow so you can check them out and please feel free to reply to this thread or leave a comment in my video!

Episode 1: "Joyful Landing"

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TDQ5mxW2FkQ

Thank you

Subscribe to me at: www.youtube,com/IRCitrine

Follow me on twitter at: www.twitter.com/Mattsolo97
